All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents an account with a name and an amount.
AccountsAdapter
AccountsAdapter is a RecyclerView.Adapter that displays a list of Account objects.
AccountsAdapter.AccountsClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an account is selected.
Add_Transaction_Fragment
 
auth_first_page
 
auth_first_pageTest
 
Category
Represents a category with a name, image, and color.
CategoryAdapter
CategoryAdapter is a RecyclerView.Adapter that displays a list of Category objects.
CategoryAdapter.CategoryClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a category is clicked.
Constants
The Constants class holds static constants and methods used throughout the application.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Expense
Represents an expense transaction with details such as category, account, note, date, amount, and ID.
firebaseAuth
 
Helper
The Helper class provides utility methods for formatting dates.
Income
Represents an income transaction with details such as category, account, note, date, amount, and ID.
login
this is lgoin
MainActivity
 
ReadWriteUserDetails
Class representing user details for reading and writing operations.
register
 
Transaction
 
TransactionFactory
The TransactionFactory class creates instances of specific Transaction implementations based on the transaction type.
TransactionsAdapter
TransactionsAdapter is a RecyclerView.Adapter that displays a list of Transaction objects.
UiTestProfile
 
User
Represents a user entity with attributes such as name, email, date of birth, mobile number, and password.
UserProfile
this is userprofile
